column5: Anyone have a recent water temperature for NW Lac Seul? Wanna know how fast I'm gonna have to jump in and out for my baths at the outpost next week. KT
5/31 main lake 54 degrees. Shallow bays 65 degrees.
The deeper you get the colder it will be. When it gets to your mid section take a deep breath!!!! We had to do that until the outfitter put a shower and water heater in...God Bless him. Mike Kansas
